Text: Take only memories, leave only footprints.
Author: Chief Seattle

Text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Author: Lao Tzu

Text: Travel is the only thing you can buy that makes you richer.
Author: Anonymous

Text: We do not inherit the Earth from our ancestors; we borrow it from our children.
Author: Native American Proverb

Text: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
Author: Saint Augustine

Text: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
Author: Gustave Flaubert

Text: Traveling – it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.
Author: Ibn Battuta

Text: Take nothing but pictures, leave nothing but footprints, kill nothing but time.
Author: Aliyyah Eniath

Text: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Text: Traveling is a brutality. It forces you to trust strangers and to lose sight of all that familiar comfort of home and friends. You are constantly off balance. Nothing is yours except the essential things: air, sleep, dreams, sea, the sky.
Author: Cesare Pavese

Text: Traveling in a way that is respectful to nature is the best way to explore our beautiful planet.
Author: Elena Johnson

Text: Choose eco-friendly transportation options and leave a smaller carbon footprint wherever you go.
Author: Benjamin Martinez

Text: Travel not only opens your eyes to new places but also to new ways of sustainable living.
Author: Sophia Thompson

Text: Embrace slow travel - immerse yourself in the local culture and minimize your impact on the environment.
Author: Oliver Walker

Text: Sustainable travel is an investment in the future of our planet. Let's choose wisely.
Author: Emily Foster

Text: Leave nothing but footprints, take nothing but pictures, and make memories that will last a lifetime.
Author: Henry Mitchell

Text: Traveling responsibly means leaving behind a positive impact on the communities and environments we visit.
Author: Ava Turner
